stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Interested in Site Reliability Engineering? Make sure to attend SREday in London! Embark on a 48-hour tech journey featuring 50+ talks by industry experts. Secure your early bird tickets today!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Interested in Site Reliability Engineering? Make sure to attend SREday in London! Embark on a 48-hour tech journey featuring 50+ talks by industry experts. Secure your early bird tickets today! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Stability AI announces StableCode
stories.Description: The startup has decided to expand its horizons with the introduction of StableCode, an open large language model that facilitates code generation at different levels.
stories.Tweet: Stability AI announces StableCode 📦 The startup has decided to expand its horizons with the introduction of StableCode, an open large language model that facilitates code generation at different levels. #ai https://venturebeat.com/programming-development/stability-ai-launches-stablecode-an-llm-for-code-generation/

stories.Title: GPTBot goes live
stories.Description: OpenAI's latest tool is a web crawler aimed at refining AI models like GPT-4. Nonetheless, websites have the option to limit access, blocking it either partially or entirely.
stories.Tweet: GPTBot goes live 📦 OpenAI's latest tool is a web crawler aimed at refining AI models like GPT-4. Nonetheless, websites have the option to limit access, blocking it either partially or entirely. #openai https://mashable.com/article/open-ai-gptbot-crawler-block

stories.Title: Bing gets closer to you
stories.Description: Microsoft's GPT-4 powered chatbot, Bing Chat, available only for Edge users, is now extending its reach to third-party browsers like Safari and Chrome.
stories.Tweet: Bing gets closer to you 📦 Microsoft's GPT-4 powered chatbot, Bing Chat, available only for Edge users, is now extending its reach to third-party browsers like Safari and Chrome. #microsoft https://www.engadget.com/microsofts-bing-chat-is-available-in-chrome-and-safari-mobile-191240880.html

stories.Title: Meet your personal DJ
stories.Description: Spotify's "DJ" feature, which combines personalized music curation with AI-driven commentary, is now accessible in over 50 markets worldwide.
stories.Tweet: Meet your personal DJ 📦 Spotify's "DJ" feature, which combines personalized music curation with AI-driven commentary, is now accessible in over 50 markets worldwide. #spotify https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/08/spotify-expands-its-ai-dj-feature-globally/

stories.Title: Introducing: Vizard.ai
stories.Description: Turn your videos into captivating clips for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and more with AI-powered editing!

stories.Title: Big investments from big players
stories.Description: As Arm gets closer to its public listing, the chip design company is attracting some of the biggest names in tech: Apple, Samsung, Nvidia, and Intel are all set to position themselves as investors.
stories.Tweet: Big investments from big players 📦 As Arm gets closer to its public listing, the chip design company is attracting some of the biggest names in tech: Apple, Samsung, Nvidia, and Intel are all set to position themselves as investors. #bigtech https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/8/23824160/arm-ipo-apple-samsung-nvidia-intel

stories.Title: Boeing isn't giving up
stories.Description: With over $1 billion in losses and major setbacks, Boeing's Starliner program is finally on a path to redemption. Targeting an early 2024 launch for crew missions to the ISS.
stories.Tweet: Boeing isn't giving up 📦 With over $1 billion in losses and major setbacks, Boeing's Starliner program is finally on a path to redemption. Targeting an early 2024 launch for crew missions to the ISS. #boeing https://gizmodo.com/boeing-starliner-crewed-flight-launch-troubles-losses-1850714559

stories.Title: From the driveway to the living room
stories.Description: GM's Ultium platform EVs are taking on a dual role: not just driving, but also powering homes. By 2026, bidirectional V2H charging will be available across the entire lineup.
stories.Tweet: From the driveway to the living room 📦 GM's Ultium platform EVs are taking on a dual role: not just driving, but also powering homes. By 2026, bidirectional V2H charging will be available across the entire lineup. #generalmotors https://electrek.co/2023/08/08/gm-vehicle-to-home-v2h-bidirectional-charging-capabilities-ultium-ev/

stories.Title: The superconductor frenzy continues
stories.Description: Original samples of the alleged LK-99 superconductor might be ready for validation studies in two weeks, adding to the growing anticipation within the global scientific community.
stories.Tweet: The superconductor frenzy continues 📦 Original samples of the alleged LK-99 superconductor might be ready for validation studies in two weeks, adding to the growing anticipation within the global scientific community. #science https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/superconductor-lk-99-sample-ready-south-korea

stories.Title: Working from home is so 2020
stories.Description: Zoom's unexpected decision to mandate in-office time for nearby employees shocked everyone. However, this trend is expected to continue as companies navigate post-pandemic work dynamics.
stories.Tweet: Working from home is so 2020 📦 Zoom's unexpected decision to mandate in-office time for nearby employees shocked everyone. However, this trend is expected to continue as companies navigate post-pandemic work dynamics. #zoom https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/08/zoom-has-zoom-fatigue-requires-workers-to-return-to-the-office/

title: OpenAI announces GPTBot, Your office misses you says Zoom, LK-99's latest news
description: OpenAI has rolled out its latest tool: a web crawler. But before we get too paranoid, here's the catch: the company allows websites to limit access. In a surprising turn of events, Zoom has decided that remote working is outdated – at least for employees living near its offices (thankfully not for me!). And continuing with the superconducting craze, it seems we must wait two weeks before determining whether it truly deserves our admiration.
